component.name: KLatexFormula
component.summary: Generate images from LaTeX equations that you can drag and drop, copy and paste or save to disk

description.p: This application provides an easy-to-use graphical user interface for generating images from LaTeX equations. These images can be dragged and dropped or copied and pasted into external applications (presentations, text documents, graphics...), or can be saved to disk in a variety of formats (PNG, JPG, BMP, EPS, PDF, etc.). In addition to the graphical user interface, a command-line interface and a C++ library is provided to perform the same job.

description.p: A long overdue version of KLatexFormula fixes a few issues and provides support for the PDF-based latex engines pdflatex, xelatex and lualatex.

ul.li: Support for PDF-based and unicode LaTeX engines pdflatex, xelatex and lualatex via a user script. (In expanded mode, select Script ▸ user script “Run pdflatex engine”)
Bug fix in copy/paste on Windows.
